§ 1715b. Rules and regulations The Secretary is authorized and directed to make such rules and regulations as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this subchapter. (June 27, 1934, ch. 847, title II, § 211, as added Feb. 3, 1938, ch. 13, § 3, 52 Stat. 23; amended Apr. 20, 1950, ch. 94, title I, § 122, 64 Stat. 59; Pub. L. 90–19, § 1(a)(3), May 25, 1967, 81 Stat. 17.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1967—Pub. L. 90–19 substituted “Secretary” for “Commissioner”. 1950—Act Apr. 20, 1950, substituted “Commissioner” for “Administrator”.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries RegulationsPub.
